benefits.title: Cannabis sativa subsp. sativa’s pharmacological properties and health effects: A scoping review of current evidence
benefits.summary: Hempseed pills improve functional constipation and show potential benefits in cannabis dependence, epilepsy, and anxiety disorders.

benefits.title: Industrial Hemp: Renewed Opportunities for an Ancient Crop
benefits.summary: Hemp offers diverse uses for fibers, seed grain, and essential oils, with potential pharmacological benefits.

benefits.title: Characterization of Lignanamides from Hemp (Cannabis sativa L.) Seed and Their Antioxidant and Acetylcholinesterase Inhibitory Activities.
benefits.summary: Hemp seed, with lignanamides as nutrients, may be a good source of bioactive and protective compounds.
benefits.journal: Journal of agricultural and food chemistry

benefits.title: The cardiac and haemostatic effects of dietary hempseed
benefits.summary: Hempseed may provide significant health benefits due to its excellent content of omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids, which have beneficial effects on cardiovascular health.

benefits.title: Comparative study of different extraction processes for hemp (Cannabis sativa) seed oil considering physical, chemical and industrial-scale economic aspects
benefits.summary: Hemp seed oil is beneficial for cardiovascular health, skin, hormonal balance, diabetes, and has potential as a bio-fuel.

benefits.title: Development and validation of genetic markers for sex and cannabinoid chemotype in Cannabis sativa L.
benefits.summary: Hemp is grown primarily for grain, fiber, and cannabinoids, with evidence for medicinal benefits of cannabidiol (CBD).

benefits.title: Hemp in Veterinary Medicine: From Feed to Drug
benefits.summary: Hemp shows excellent nutritional and health-promoting properties, mainly due to its high content in polyunsaturated fatty acids and phenolic compounds, which help prevent common diseases.

benefits.title: A comparative study of seed yield and oil composition of four cultivars of Hemp (Cannabis sativa L.) grown from three regions in northern Iran
benefits.summary: Hemp oil has health benefits such as cholesterol lowering properties and decreasing high blood pressure due to the presence of essential fatty acids linoleic acid and Î2-linolenic.

benefits.title: Hemp (Cannabis sativa L.) Seed and Co-Products Inclusion in Diets for Dairy Ruminants: A Review
benefits.summary: Hemp supplementation in dairy ruminants' diets improves the content of beneficial bioactive compounds like n-3 fatty acids and conjugated linoleic acid, which are beneficial to human health.
benefits.journal: Animals : an Open Access Journal from MDPI

benefits.title: A framework for the development of hemp (Cannabis sativa L.) as a crop for the future in tropical environments
benefits.summary: Hemp has high potential for economic returns for its seeds and fiber, with minimum economically feasible yields of 1.38 t ha-1 (seed) and 3.62 t ha-1 (fiber).

side effects.title: Evidence for side effects of cannabidiol (CBD) products and their non-conformity on the European food market - response to the European Industrial Hemp Association.
side effects.summary: There is ample evidence for side effects of CBD products, including inadvertent "high" effects, in both pediatric and adult users of over-the-counter CBD products.

side effects.title: A Conversion of Oral Cannabidiol to Delta9-Tetrahydrocannabinol Seems Not to Occur in Humans
side effects.summary: Oral CBD does not convert to THC in vivo, and the typical side effects of THC (dizziness, euphoria/high, thinking abnormal/concentration difficulties, nausea, tachycardia) have not been observed after treatment with CBD in clinical trials.

side effects.title: Cannabinoid-related agents in the treatment of anxiety disorders: current knowledge and future perspectives.
side effects.summary: Hemp's main psychoactive ingredient, THC, can either attenuate or exacerbate anxiety and fear-related behaviors in humans and experimental animals.
side effects.journal: Recent patents on CNS drug discovery

side effects.title: Effects of Hemp Extract on Markers of Wellness, Stress Resilience, Recovery and Clinical Biomarkers of Safety in Overweight, But Otherwise Healthy Subjects
side effects.summary: Hemp supplementation improved HDL cholesterol, tended to support psychometric measures of perceived sleep, stress response, and perceived life pleasure, and was well tolerated with no clinically relevant safety concerns.

side effects.title: Effect-directed analysis of cold-pressed hemp, flax and canola seed oils by planar chromatography linked with (bio)assays and mass spectrometry.
side effects.summary: Cold-pressed hemp oil contains compounds with antioxidative, antimicrobial, acetylcholinesterase inhibitory, and estrogenic activities.

side effects.title: Hemp (Cannabis sativa L.) Seed and Co-Products Inclusion in Diets for Dairy Ruminants: A Review
side effects.summary: Hemp supplementation in dairy ruminants' diets improves bioactive compounds in milk and cheese, with no negative effects of anti-nutritional factors like phytate observed.
side effects.journal: Animals : an Open Access Journal from MDPI

side effects.title: A Review of Hemp as Food and Nutritional Supplement.
side effects.summary: Hemp inflorescence is rich in nonpsychoactive cannabinoids like cannabidiol (CBD), which exerts potent anxiolytic, spasmolytic, and anticonvulsant effects.

side effects.title: Immunomodulatory and therapeutic effects of Hot-nature diet and co-supplemented hemp seed, evening primrose oils intervention in multiple sclerosis patients.
side effects.summary: Co-supplemented hemp seed and evening primrose oils with Hot-nature diet have beneficial effects in improving clinical scores in RRMS patients.

side effects.title: Water Extract from Inflorescences of Industrial Hemp Futura 75 Variety as a Source of Anti-Inflammatory, Anti-Proliferative and Antimycotic Agents: Results from In Silico, In Vitro and Ex Vivo Studies
side effects.summary: Futura 75 water extract from industrial hemp inflorescences has anti-inflammatory, anti-proliferative, and antimycotic effects.

side effects.title: Applications of Cannabis Sativa L. in Food and Its Therapeutic Potential: From a Prohibited Drug to a Nutritional Supplement.
side effects.summary: Cannabis has both positive and negative health impacts, with negative impacts on respiratory system, driving, psychomotor functions, and reproductive system.

dosage.title: Effects of Hemp Extract on Markers of Wellness, Stress Resilience, Recovery and Clinical Biomarkers of Safety in Overweight, But Otherwise Healthy Subjects
dosage.summary: Hemp oil extract (60 mg/d plus 15 mg hemp-derived CBD) improved HDL cholesterol and was well tolerated with no clinically relevant safety concerns.

dosage.title: Single-Dose Pharmacokinetics and Preliminary Safety Assessment with Use of CBD-Rich Hemp Nutraceutical in Healthy Dogs and Cats
dosage.summary: Oral CBD-rich hemp supplements with a 2 mg/kg total CBD concentration were administered twice daily for 12 weeks in healthy dogs and cats.
dosage.journal: Animals : an Open Access Journal from MDPI

dosage.title: Evaluating the impact of hemp food consumption on workplace drug tests.
dosage.summary: Extended daily ingestion of THC via hemp oil ranging from 0.09 to 0.6 mg did not cause confirmed positive results in urine specimens for marijuana.

dosage.title: Plasma concentrations of eleven cannabinoids in cattle following oral administration of industrial hemp (Cannabis sativa)
dosage.summary: A single oral dose of 35g of industrial hemp achieved a target dose of 5.4 mg/kg cannabidiolic acid (CBDA) in cattle.

dosage.title: Setting characteristics of natural cellulose fiber reinforced cement composite
dosage.summary: Hemp fiber dosages (0, 0.25, 0.5, 1, and 2) affect the setting characteristics of cement composites.

dosage.title: Cannabis sativa (Hemp) Seeds, Δ9-Tetrahydrocannabinol, and Potential Overdose
dosage.summary: Hemp seeds can have Î± -9-THC concentrations as high as 1250% of the legal limit, which is 10 g per gram of hemp seeds (10 ppm).

dosage.title: Serum Cannabinoid 24 h and 1 Week Steady State Pharmacokinetic Assessment in Cats Using a CBD/CBDA Rich Hemp Paste
dosage.summary: A standard dose of 6.4 mg/CBD + CBDA 5.3 mg/gram of CBD/CBDA rich hemp paste was used in this study.

dosage.title: Detection of delta-9-tetrahydrocannabinol (THC) in oral fluid, blood and urine following oral consumption of low-content THC hemp oil.
dosage.summary: Low-content THC hemp oil (0.046mg THC per 5mL dose) does not result in positive biological assessments, making it unlikely to negatively impact existing drug driving enforcement protocols.

dosage.title: Preliminary Study on Radiation Sensibility of Seeds of Several Hemp Varieties
dosage.summary: The half lethal dosage (LD50) of dry hemp seeds is between 1400 and 3500Gy.

dosage.title: Nutrition and health functionality of hemp products in wheat cereal products – butter cut-out biscuits and leavened pastry
dosage.summary: Hemp seeds can be used in dosages limited by sensory quality of the final products, such as up to 10% for pastry, to increase the nutritional value of food.
dosage.journal: MASO INTERNATIONAL – JOURNAL OF FOOD SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
